mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t1.archive_id AS "archiveId", t1.name AS "name", t1.sex AS "sex", t1.age AS "age", t1.business_no AS "businessNo", concat(t1.building_name,'-',t1.floor_name,'-',t1.room_name,'-',t1.bed_name) AS "bed", date_format(t2.record_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS "recordTime", t2.time_point AS "timePoint", t2.is_haircut AS "isHaircut", t2.is_manicure AS "isManicure", t2.is_clean_toilet AS "isCleanToilet", t2.is_hang_clothes AS "isHangClothes", t2.is_clean_room AS "isCleanRoom", t2.is_meals AS "isMeals", t2.is_wash_gargle AS "isWashGargle", t2.physical_and_mental_status AS "physicalAndMentalStatus", t2.other, t2.temperature AS "temperature", t2.pulse AS "pulse", t2.breathing AS "breathing", t2.low_blood_pressure AS "lowBloodPressure", t2.high_blood_pressure AS "highBloodPressure", t2.intake AS "intake", t2.output AS "output", t2.urine AS "urine", t2.weight AS "weight", t2.creator_id AS "creatorId", date_format(t2.create_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "createTime" FROM bus_hospital_record t1 LEFT JOIN bus_nursing_record t2 ON t1.business_no = t2.business_no AND t2.is_del = 0 AND date_format(t2.record_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{recordTime} AND t2.time_point = #{timePoint} WHERE t1.is_del = 0 AND t1.status = 0 ORDER BY t1.name
